Package com.atakmap.android.radiolibrary

Interface RoverInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRoverImpl
    public interface RoverInterface
    This is only used for swapping the video implementation for the Rover line of products. Do not use for other video

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  RoverInterface.RadioListener
      Allows for a registered receiver to get command output, input, status, and preset information when changed.
      static class  RoverInterface.Receiver
      Receiver class, provides status information (hearbeat) for the rover.

      • testConnection

        boolean testConnection​(java.net.NetworkInterface ni,
                       java.net.InetAddress address,
                       java.lang.String roverIP)
        Tries to connect to the web interface of the rover radio to verify that it is reachable.
        Parameters:
        ni - the network interface to use
        address - the inetAddress to try to connect to
        roverIP - the rover address as a backup in case the address is not used.
        Returns:

      • setEncodingParam

        void setEncodingParam​(int bitrate,
                      boolean encodingHalf,
                      boolean mpeg2)
        If MPEG-2 is true, then attempt to deliver the encoded video as MPEG-2. Will fall back to H.264.

      • setChannel

        void setChannel​(java.lang.String m,
                int channel)
        ModuleType is one of "M1", "M2", "M3", "M4"
